A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely loved it.  Al of my kids loved it.  So many plot twists and amazing action sequences.   I really enjoyed the cinematography.  Rian did a superb job of bringing in humor and parallel editing.  I was very impressed with his use of thematics from other sci fi films in the past that are not in the Star Wars Universe.  I think he has creaed a bold new vision of Star Wars for this nnew generation.  I was worried because Disney has a tendancey to dumb down everything it touches.  However\, Rian managed to deliver an excellent film despite their meddling.  I loved the opening sequence and his play on the story roll.  I would like to see Ray's internal dialogue verbalized a bit more.  I like what he did\, but hoped it would linger a bit more and add in that scene\, which I will not spoil.  He totally nailed the mercurial nature of the Sith!
